title: Travel Phrasebook | Foreign Language Translator
summary: Travel conversation book - Easily learn & speak foreign language phrases!
description: The “Travel Phrasebook” app has many useful foreign phrases and words (e.g., “Thank you!”, “How much?” or “A table for two, please!”). When you tap a phrase, the app speaks it aloud. There is no guessing as to how to pronounce the words. And if the app is talking too quickly for you, simply tap the snail/turtle icon to hear the words more slowly. Listen to pronunciation recorded by native speaker and then record and play back your own voice to practice your foreign language speaking skills!When traveling to foreign countries, make sure you bring the app with you! Ideally you listen to a phrase and repeat it, but if your accent is terrible, you can play the voice on the app to local people (e.g., a waiter or store clerk). Language barrier while travelling abroad will no longer exist!FEATURES - Many useful foreign phrases & words- Pronunciation recorded by native speaker- Voice recording & playback- No Internet connection required- Instant search by keywords- Customizable font sizeWelcome to download the “Travel Phrasebook” app! Easily learn foreign language phrases & words including English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Dutch, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese, Greek, Arabic, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, and Hindi!ABOUT Bravolol - Web site: http://www.bravolol.com - Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Bravolol - Twitter: https://twitter.com/BravololApps- Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/bravolol/- Email: cs@bravolol.com
descriptionHTML:
The “Travel Phrasebook” app has many useful foreign phrases and words (e.g., “Thank you!”, “How much?” or “A table for two, please!”). When you tap a phrase, the app speaks it aloud. There is no guessing as to how to pronounce the words. And if the app is talking too quickly for you, simply tap the snail/turtle icon to hear the words more slowly. Listen to pronunciation recorded by native speaker and then record and play back your own voice to practice your foreign language speaking skills!

When traveling to foreign countries, make sure you bring the app with you! Ideally you listen to a phrase and repeat it, but if your accent is terrible, you can play the voice on the app to local people (e.g., a waiter or store clerk). Language barrier while travelling abroad will no longer exist!

FEATURES

- Many useful foreign phrases & words
- Pronunciation recorded by native speaker
- Voice recording & playback
- No Internet connection required
- Instant search by keywords
- Customizable font size

Welcome to download the “Travel Phrasebook” app! Easily learn foreign language phrases & words including English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Dutch, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese, Greek, Arabic, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, and Hindi!

ABOUT Bravolol

comments: I think it's a good app because you can learn new languages
Very good app to learn and understand the basics of each language.  If they would include more languages that would awesome.
I Love It! Now i can learn more about every language but please add an irish language i like to learn that
It will be useful for everyone who want to learn languages from basic.
Very good and better if can use offline
recentChanges: - Added British English, Latin American Spanish, Thai, Greek, Indonesian, Dutch and Hindi language packs
- Supported male and female voice for American English, French, German, Italian, Japanese and Chinese
